data.name: Pump & Dump Scams 101
data.text: Never invest in a stock just because someone is touting it on social media. Do your own research and look for reputable sources of information. Beware of any investment opportunity that promises high returns with little or no risk.

data.name: Spotting Pump & Dumps
data.text: Be wary of stocks that have a sudden, unexplained spike in price followed by an equally sudden drop. Look for unusually high trading volumes, particularly from unknown or offshore brokers. Avoid stocks that are being promoted through spam emails or unsolicited phone calls.
